## Complete your first `swirl` lesson

*Estimated time: [20] min*

1. Open RStudio in your preferred environment.
1. In the R console window, type the following commands to load the Swirl package:
```
library (swirl)
swirl()
```
1. Install the course “**R Programming: The basics of programming in R**”, by following the instructions provided by swirl
  1. Enter your name.
  1. Press ENTER.
  1. Enter 1, 2, or 3.
  1. Install the course “R Programming: The basics of programming in R”.
1. Complete your first lesson.
  1. Select “**R Programming**”.
  1. Select “**Basic Building Blocks**”, by entering `1` ( i.e. the corresponding lesson number ).
  1. Follow the instructions provided by swirl to complete your first lesson.
  1. At the end, when Swirl asks if you would like to receive Coursera credit, select “No”.
